channel.title: BadScape, welcome to hell!
channel.description:
Hey this is a new server release :eek:! i will be hosting badscape a new rsc ps, so come check us out, no website yet, nothing too fancy just a new server with a VERY active admin, completely rebuilt edgeville and redesigning EXP arrays, will be working on new NPC and drops in the coming days, come get a limited time chance for custom drops at KBD until i finish the custom smithing skill.
DOWNLOAD LINKS: Mega - mega.co.nz/#!51N2gCSC!Qu1f6PBI1DxvFZHstU9ED70Q1PuMgINshlunjiHeyZE
FileDropper - www.filedropper.com/distclient
TinyUpload - s000.tinyupload.com/?file_id=70398533206049640491
Current Skill Level Max set to 120. 35x exp multiplier (70x for Subs), custom npc zones throughout wild
WE do however have a forum: http://www.hellescape.proboards.com

item.title: BadScape, welcome to hell!
item.dc:creator: @badb0y1 badb0y1
item.description:
@badb0y1 wrote:

Level 99 max reinstated for now :eek:.
Lottery System Added.
Subscription System Added.
Tutorial Island Added.

Project Skilling Progress:
Dragon Mining = 80% :eek:
Dragon Smithing = 0% :palm:

Note: server downtime extended until tomorrow around midnight. - thanks at&t.

Read full topic

item.title: BadScape, welcome to hell!
item.dc:creator: @Aleka Aleka
item.description:
@Aleka wrote:

[quote=“badb0y1, post:10, topic:547890”][quote]
Looks like somebody is using my concept. Pretty interesting.
[/quote]

ehhh we have a fair exchange i like some of your ideas, you like some of mine. ;)[/quote]

I’m not hating my dude. I’m actually impressed +1 for the server. I’ll keep an eye out on it.

Read full topic

item.title: BadScape, welcome to hell!
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Glad to see that you’ve worked with the landscape editor. May need additional hands to come up with new towns in the all from scratch continent of wilderness on Wolf Kingdom.

Read full topic

item.title: BadScape, welcome to hell!
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

badb0y1:

updates are postponed to weekends only, sorry slave i have a life rather than providing you with a free game :eek: wow who woulda thought it. yeah i got shit to do my nigga, well whats gonna happen? :palm: im gonna keep producing free shit for you to complain about on weekends only.

sorry man, i just posted for the fudge of it. i just saw “welcome to hell” and posted this shit. im sorry dude, dont worry about it man.

it looks like a fine server, im just bieng a dick

Read full topic

no one cares, this is so lame it should be: welcome to hell, who gives a shit,

item.title: BadScape, welcome to hell!
item.dc:creator: @Aleka Aleka
item.description:
@Aleka wrote:

[quote=“badb0y1, post:4, topic:547890”][quote author=cleako link=topic=666797.msg4458441#msg4458441 date=1416241227]
Oh boy, I’m going to be BAD at playing BadScape. So are you going to do the hell idea?

My concept for hellrsc.
Make everybody start with 99 everything and de-level it to 1.
So when they grow a level it goes down to 98 and so on until its level 1.
Make players only speak with profanities to each other otherwise there banned.
Make wilderness in every bank.
You die you restart.
If a person is afk there banned.

That will be the worst server ever but im tempted to make it

[/quote]

that was the original idea so yeah there will definitely be some custom additions of hell later on im going to work with the textures etc.

for now here are some quick screenies i took



[/quote]

Looks like somebody is using my concept. Pretty interesting.

Read full topic
